typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{EquipmentHeader.OEMName} as string,
		{EquipmentHeader.Model} as string,
		{EquipmentHeader.EquipmentID} as string,
		{EquipmentHeader.SerialNumber} as string,
		{Location.Latitude} as string,
		{Location.Longitude} as string,
		{Location.Altitude} as string,
		{Location.AltitudeUnits} as string,
		{Location.Datetime} as string,
		{CumulativeldleHours.Hour} as string,
		{CumulativeldleHours.Datetime} as string,
		{CumulativeOperationHours.Hour} as string,
		{CumulativeOperationHours.Datetime} as string,
		{DEFRemaining.Percent} as string,
		{DEFRemaining.Datetime} as string,
		{Distance.OdometerUnits} as string,
		{Distance.Odometer} as string,
		{EngineStatus.EngineNumber} as string,
		{EngineStatus.Running} as string,
		{EngineStatus.Datetime} as string,
		{FuelUsed.FuelUnits} as string,
		{Fuelused.FuelConsumed} as string,
		{FuelUsed.Datetime} as string,
		{FuelUsedLast24.FuelUnits} as string,
		{FuelUsedLast24.FuelConsumed} as string,
		{FuelUsedLast24.Datetime} as string,
		{FuelRemaining.Percent} as string,
		{FuelRemaining.Datetime} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{EquipmentHeader.OEMName} as string,
		{EquipmentHeader.Model} as string,
		{EquipmentHeader.EquipmentID} as string,
		{EquipmentHeader.SerialNumber} as string,
		{Location.Latitude} as string,
		{Location.Longitude} as string,
		{Location.Altitude} as string,
		{Location.AltitudeUnits} as string,
		{Location.Datetime} as string,
		{CumulativeldleHours.Hour} as string,
		{CumulativeldleHours.Datetime} as string,
		{CumulativeOperationHours.Hour} as string,
		{CumulativeOperationHours.Datetime} as string,
		{DEFRemaining.Percent} as string,
		{DEFRemaining.Datetime} as string,
		{Distance.OdometerUnits} as string,
		{Distance.Odometer} as string,
		{EngineStatus.EngineNumber} as string,
		{EngineStatus.Running} as string,
		{EngineStatus.Datetime} as string,
		{FuelUsed.FuelUnits} as string,
		{Fuelused.FuelConsumed} as string,
		{FuelUsed.Datetime} as string,
		{FuelUsedLast24.FuelUnits} as string,
		{FuelUsedLast24.FuelConsumed} as string,
		{FuelUsedLast24.Datetime} as string,
		{FuelRemaining.Percent} as string,
		{FuelRemaining.Datetime} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CAT_FleetSnapsShot'],
	postSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CAT_FleetSnapsShot_New'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkNewData
